regulus_mtgamejam_2023.short_description: Recover the crystal and bring light back into the world

regulus_mtgj2024.short_description: Darkness has come upon the world. Can you find the spell to banish it?

no_mans_land.short_description: Work in Progress. Survive No Man's Land, where TNT rains from the sky, and destroys everything. This is a Work in Progress, I wanna add more features & lore

yams.short_description: An MTG fork with light RPG elements.

mesecraft.short_description: The best game for Minetest. A survival game with new depth, mechanics, biomes, mobs and many essential additions. Has a focus on being fun, user-friendly, stable, and minimalist but featured.

mineclone2.short_description: Survive, farm, build, explore, play with friends, and do much more. Inspired by Minecraft, pushing beyond.

lazarr.short_description: Be a pirate and solve laser puzzles (UNFINISHED!)

shadow_forest.short_description: The forest has been overrun by the Shadows who’ve cursed it with eternal darkness. You’re the Wizard of Light; you’re the only hope to break the curse.

libre_adventure3.short_description: Minecraft golden age clone with improvements

ksurvive.short_description: A game that changes much of MTG's gameplay.

tolkientest.short_description: A fork of LOTT with a ton of new content

mineclonia.short_description: Survival sandbox game inspired by Minecraft.

minefall.short_description: Fight, farm, explore, build. Solo or multiplayer.

luckysweeper.short_description: Proof of concept of a minesweeper game using the MTE.

blank.short_description: Absolute blank template to start your projects from.

ghost_crypt.short_description: Steal the treasure while avoiding ghosts.

slide_space.short_description: Choose your direction wisely. A simple puzzle game.

wine.short_description: Adds wine barrel to ferment different foods into drinks.

pathogen.short_description: Anables users to get a pathogen.

glamorous_deaths.short_description: Announce player demise via server-wide death messages

areasprotector.short_description: Simple protector block for ShadowNinja's areas system

random_teleport.short_description: Allows players to teleport to a random location using the /rtp command.

bunker.short_description: Add blast proof concrete and its craft items.

magma.short_description: Adds volcanoes, lava vents and new magma blocks

treeparticles.short_description: Adds particles of falling leaves when you punch a tree

serversay.short_description: Write in the Chat as the server

cleanchat.short_description: Parents wish to protect their children from possibly harmful words in chat. This allows them to maintain a list per player, which the parents in lieu of their children can extend by themselves.

edutest.short_description: Provides a GUI frontend for the educational staff.

itemquantifiermod.short_description: a mod for mineclone 2 which adds a comparator which checks if there are more than 10 items in the first slot

speed_boots.short_description: Fork of ClothierEdward's "Boots Of Swiftness", adds new boots that let you jump higher and run faster

morebricks.short_description: Adds an assortment of new bricks to build with.

magic_compass.short_description: Teleport system, all inside a compass

coloredblocks.short_description: Different colors of: stone, stone bricks, wood obsidian, and glass

spawn.short_description: Drop-in replacement for default/spawn for more third-party biomes

handholds_redo.short_description: Adds additional functionality to pickaxes as a climbing tool

lighting_monoid.short_description: Provides a compatibility API for player lighting

unified_stamina.short_description: Provides a universal API for handling different mods that provide a stamina bar

local_time_api.short_description: This is a minetest mod that provides an api for other mods to use to get a user's preferred date and time format/time zone based on their configured settings for this mod.

shifter_tool.short_description: Adds a tool for moving nodes as pistons would

digilines.short_description: This mod adds digiline wires, an RTC (Real Time Clock), a light sensor as well as an LCD Screen.

flamethrower.short_description: Adds a flamethrower using particles. It makes things burn and scorches grass; does not cause damage to any object.

sfcraftguide.short_description: An augmented mtg_craftguide. Supports a progressive reveal system that follows doc items help.

claycrafter.short_description: Introduces the Claycrafter, which converts Compressed Dirt to Clay using Glasses of Water.

prismatic_stone.short_description: Adds decorative prismatic stone blocks, coral dyes, and six new crafting recipes.

ore_deposits.short_description: Adds ore deposits that can randomly spawn on stone

nickname.short_description: This mod set a nickname with color to the player.

tntrun.short_description: Players compete to be the last one standing on a layer of falling TNT

frozenenergy.short_description: Use frozen energy crystals to freeze water

yatranslate.short_description: Adds commands to translate chat messages into the recipient's language.

colour_jump.short_description: A simple minigame where the players need to jump on the correct platform to avoid to fall down

better_water_physics.short_description: Adds much desired water physics like splashes upon jumping in, and underwater ambience.

texttext.short_description: Replace textures of nodes with their names.

online_shop.short_description: Allows players to buy and trade anywhere.

ctf_extra_maps.short_description: Adds some extra maps to the Capture the Flag game.

vampire.short_description: the player can become a vampire by drinking a potion

fumoplushies.short_description: silly fumo plushies to decorate your world with

crewmate.short_description: these are some silly CrewMates plushies

fbt_core.short_description: A set of utils for other fbt_* mods

sway.short_description: A simple inventory that makes use of Flow forms.

ediblestuff_api.short_description: A unified API for making items, tools and armor edible. Eat armor while wearing it!

falling_stairs.short_description: Adds falling stairs and slabs for gravel, sand and others.

pumpkin_pies.short_description: Adds various recipes for making pumpkin pies.

mcl_allthingschocolate.short_description: Adds dark and milk chocolate bars plus chocolate cake.

castle.short_description: This is a modpack all about creating castles and castle dungeons.

boost_cart.short_description: This mod offers improved minecarts and a few more rail types.

justzoom.short_description: Allows you to just zoom at any time

hammermod.short_description: Adds a steel hammer which allows to dig 3x3.

deck.short_description: Deck of cards and table blocks

lib_chatcmdbuilder.short_description: A library to make registering chat commands easier

libox_controller.short_description: A fork of mooncontroller made to use libox, also has QOL improvements

living_grass.short_description: Adds a simple lifecycle to grass

jelys_pizzaria.short_description: Adds Pizza as an Endgame food

yl_matterbridge.short_description: Handles chat between Minetest and Matterbridge

atl_shears.short_description: This mod adds a pair of shears to easily cut foliage, flowers, wool etc.

railbuilder.short_description: This mod allows you to plan and build tunnels and rails for Advtrains.

aether_new.short_description: Adds a hard to obtain yet powerful substance called Aether.

mcl_build_spawner.short_description: Gives build spawner for spawing builds in mineclone 2 and 5

pirate_story.short_description: a story about a wannabe pirate

bm_quartz_compat.short_description: Compatibility between Basic Materials, Quartz, and Everness.

ancient_fertilizer.short_description: Adds ancient fertilizer, sourced from ancient stone in the underground, useful for farming flowers if you need dye for colored nodes, complements bonemeal.

notices.short_description: Adds chatcommands server staff can use for announcements

pink_details.short_description: Makes various color blocks and tools to pink. If you like pink, this is for you!

good_morning_craft.short_description: A simple yet quirky texture pack by Louis Durrant

broken_textures.short_description: Reality fractures into a looping anomaly, leaving only a distorted echo of what once was.

aephorus.short_description: Simple, pixelish, cartoonish and vibrant texture pack.

mcl_tf2.short_description: Adds clean and recognizable TF2 textures to your world.

voxels_reworked.short_description: A texture pack that iterates on the Pixel Perfection texture pack by XSSheep for the VoxeLibre game.

wintercore_dark.short_description: Dark and bold textures for NodeCore by WintersKnight94

wintercore_thra.short_description: 32x32 Nodecore textures Inspired by the world of Thra, from The Dark Crystal.

outline_square_crosshair.short_description: It replaces the + and X crosshair to the outline square crosshair.

default_grid.short_description: Add grid overlay to MT Game 5.0 default textures.

lessdirt.short_description: Adjusts textures so rolling hills have less exposed bare dirt.

simplepixel.short_description: SimplePixel is a texturepack, inspired by on MC Promo Art/Barebones Texturepack. This texturepack is simple, yet elegant.

12345.short_description: Wilhelmines Texture Pack – Inspired by the colors of Nature!
